name: Libellule Earrings, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling silver earrings handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Libellule Earrings are crafted to resemble dragonfly wings in the Art Nouveau style. The sinuous, curving lines are reminiscent of the works of this period, made popular in France in the early 1900s. The name 'libellule' translates from french to 'dragonfly.'  Stunning and intricate metalwork makes them a beautiful everyday accessory. 

Leverback earrings. Piece appx. 1"W x 1.5"H 

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love these earrings for years to come.

name: Arrow Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver Necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Arrow Necklace is beautifully hand carved with a brushed matte finish. This tribal inspired piece is edgy and fun. With its bold, dramatic lines and sharp angles, it is truly a work of wearable art.

16,"18," or 24" rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 0.5"W x 1.5"H.

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Botanical Swing Earrings, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling silver earrings handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Botanical Swing Earrings are meticulously crafted, using silver that fades into black for a beautiful ombr√© look. Long and dramatic chain sweeps down around the intricately designed botanical "pods." An elegant and versatile statement piece.

French wire earrings. Piece appx. 0.5"W x 3.5"H (height to the very end of the chain). The chain can be made shorter upon request.

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love these earrings for years to come.

name: Hama Rikyu Earrings with White Topaz, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver earrings handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Gorgeous, draping silver hangs like the weeping willow trees in a Japanese Garden. Named after the Hama Rikyu gardens in Tokyo, these earrings are graceful and full of movement. They are the perfect complement to any outfit.

French Earwires. Piece appx. 1"W x 2.5"H.

White topaz gemstone drops. Please keep in mind that these are natural stones, and may vary slightly. It is these natural variations that give them character.

You will love these earrings for years to come.

name: Saturn Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace designed & handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Three beautiful hand formed circles are intertwined and laced with rolo chain. The Saturn Necklace is so unique, but perfect for everyday wear.

16" or 18" double rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 1"W x 0.5"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Phoenix Wing Earrings, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver earrings handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Phoenix Wing Earrings are beautifully hand formed, and polished to a high shine.  Curving silver forms a delicate wing shape.  Easygoing and feminine, they are the perfect earrings for any occasion.

French earwires.  Piece appx. 0.6"W x 2"H.

You will love these earrings for years to come.

name: Skeleton Key Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver Necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Skeleton Key necklace is an edgy twist on the old skeleton keys that were commonly used up to the 1940s. The key's bow is a meticulously hand carved skull, polished to a high shine and oxidized black in the eyes, nose, and mouth. 

16" or 18" thick rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Chain is oxidized black for a dramatic effect. Piece appx. 0.5"W x 2"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Sweet Cupcake Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Whimsical and just so much fun, this necklace is inspired by those fabulous little cakes. The Sweet Cupcake Necklace is the perfect way to treat yourself, and is guaranteed to last longer than the real thing.

16" or 18" double rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp.  Piece appx. 1"W x 1.3"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Tide Pool Bracelet, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver bracelet handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Inspired by the ocean's movement, the Tide Pool Collection features hand carved waves of shiny metal. They look simply stunning when they catch the light, and are so fluid and graceful. The perfect everyday accessory.

7" or 8" Bracelet. 

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love this bracelet for years to come

name: Shark Jaw Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Shark Jaw Necklace is beautifully dramatic piece. It is hand carved to capture the fluid, precise lines of a Great White Shark's jawbones, right down to the jagged teeth. The jaw is finished in a brushed sterling silver, and the teeth are polished to a high shine. This piece aims to capture the remarkable beauty of the most awe inspiring and terrifying part of the shark's anatomy.

$25 from the proceeds of this necklace will be donated to the World Wildlife Fund's 'Adopt a Great White Shark,' which supports WWF's global efforts to protect these creatures and their habitats. For more information or to make a donation to this cause, please visit: http://www.worldwildlife.org/gift-center/gifts/Species-Adoptions/Great-White-Shark.aspx.

16", 18", or 24" box chain with teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 1.5"W x 1.25"H.

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Greek Isle Necklace with Labradorite, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Greek Isle is polished to a high gloss finish, and is an absolutely gorgeous necklace. Hand formed silver is lined with intricate bubbles, like waves lapping up on the shore.  A sparkling gemstone drips from the curved silver.

16" or 18" thick rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp.  Piece appx. 1"W x 2.6"H.

Labradorite gemstone drop. Please keep in mind that these are natural stones, and may vary slightly. It is these natural variations that give them character.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Sparrow Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

A fluid and gorgeous flying birdie, the Sparrow Necklace is a work of art. Carefully hand carved and substantial, this piece is for the bird aficionado and nature lover alike.

16" or 18" thick rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 1.5"W x 1"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Mayan Reef Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Inspired by the gorgeous flora and fauna of Mexico's coastline, the Mayan Reef Necklace is simply stunning.  With its fluid, organic lines and beautiful details, this piece is sure to be a favorite.

16" or 18" thick rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 1"W x 2.3"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

name: Unicorn Horn Necklace, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling silver necklace handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

The Unicorn Horn Necklace is a lovely piece of hand carved, solid sterling silver. Whimsical and beautiful, the spiral shape gradually tapers down to a point. The outer surface is a brushed, matte finish, while the inner spiral is polished to a high shine. The contrast is absolutely stunning. Inspired by the Queen's Beasts in Britain, this mythical unicorn horn is a unique accessory indeed.

16,"18," or 32" curb chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 1"W x 1.5"H

Each piece of LUCIUS jewelry arrives in a black velvet box, ready for gift giving.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

16" or 18" double rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp. Piece appx. 2.25"W x 1.5"H.

You will love this necklace for years to come.

description:

name: Skully Ring, Sterling Silver
description:
Sterling Silver ring handmade by the artist in our Chicago studio.

Skully is meticulously hand carved, polished to a high shine and oxidized black in the eyes, nose, and mouth. Inspired by D√≠a de los Muertos, or the Mayan Day of the Dead, this little skull is edgy and fun.

Sterling silver, available in sizes 4-9. Piece appx. 0.5"W x 0.5"H. Rings are custom made to fit your size, and take 2-3 weeks for delivery.

You will love this ring for years to come.

16" or 18" double rolo chain and teardrop lobster clasp.  Piece appx. 0.6"W x 2.4"H.

Swiss blue topaz gemstone drop. Please keep in mind that these are natural stones, and may vary slightly. It is these natural variations that give them character.

You will love this necklace for years to come.
